## Properties

| Property            | Attribute | Description                                                        | Type     | Default     |
| ------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- | ----------- |
| `href` _(required)_ | `href`    | The href attribute specifies the URL of the opposite language page | `string` | `undefined` |
